mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_info( file_id, file_path, file_name, file_type, table_name, file_size, group_id ) VALUES ( file_id_seq.nextval, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{tableName}, #{fileSize}, #{groupId} )
mapper.select: SELECT fi.file_name as file_name FROM building_info bi JOIN file_info fi ON bi.group_id = fi.group_id WHERE bi.building_id = #{buildingId}
